title: Port Fairy Escape on Victoria's Great Ocean Road
description: The magic of the Great Ocean Road awaits at The Victoria Apartments. Experience two nights in a self-contained apartment for either two or four guests located in the picturesque seaside town of Port Fairy - the final destination along Victoria's famous Shipwreck Coast.

title: Great Ocean Road Summer Escape in Port Fairy
description: The summertime magic of Australia’s most famous coastal drive awaits at The Victoria Apartments in the picturesque seaside town of Port Fairy - the final destination along Victoria's famous Shipwreck Coast - where you’ll enjoy the freedom and flexibility of a self-contained escape, staying in a modern suite or apartment for two or three nights with a leisurely late checkout and a convenient early check-in (subject to availability).

title: Romantic Port Fairy Heritage-Listed Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Happy Hour & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
It’s time to treat yourself to a dreamy coastal staycation: venture to the end of the scenic Great Ocean Road to meet the quaint beachside town of Port Fairy, where a stay at The Oak & Anchor Hotel promises relaxation.

This heritage-listed property has played a part in the town’s history since the mid-1800s, and its location at the end of this iconic coastal stretch makes it all the more tempting to leave the city behind.

Spend the summer months making the most of the beach and the cooler winter days spotting pods of migrating whales. While days away browsing endless antique stores and small boutiques, before returning to your boutique hotel for dinner at the cosy restaurant.
offer_address: 9 Bank Street, Port Fairy, Victoria 3284, Australia

title: Romantic Port Fairy Heritage-Listed Hideaway with Daily Breakfast
description: It’s time to treat yourself to a dreamy coastal adults-only staycation: venture to the end of the scenic Great Ocean Road to meet the sleepy beachside town of Port Fairy, where a stay at The Oak & Anchor Hotel promises relaxation. This heritage-listed property has played a part in the town’s history since the mid-1800s, and its location at the end of this iconic coastal stretch makes it all the more tempting to leave the city behind. Spend the summer months making the most of the beach and the cooler winter days spotting pods of migrating whales. While days away browsing endless antique stores and small boutiques, before returning to your boutique hotel.
offer_address: 9 Bank Street, Port Fairy, Victoria 3284, Australia

title: Port Fairy Heritage-Listed Boutique Luxury
description:
Escape to the idyllic Port Fairy, where a tranquil stay at The Oak & Anchor Hotel awaits. Set at the very end of the famed Great Ocean Road, this dreamy heritage-listed, boutique property has been a feature of the town’s vibrant and colourful history since the mid-1800s and makes for the perfect excuse to leave the city behind. Each of the hotel's six charming suites features vast open-plan bathrooms and high-end decor to create a serene space.

Architecture aficionados will love wandering the streets of Port Fairy in search of one of the 50 buildings classified by the National Trust, while history enthusiasts will revel in the chance to uncover the rich maritime past on the Shipwreck and Maritime Heritage Walk. Gourmands can enjoy the endless fine food and wines at one of the many great pubs, cafés or restaurants. In the winter months, be sure to keep an eye out for southern right whales off the coast.
offer_address: 9 Bank Street, Port Fairy, Victoria 3284, Australia

title: Romantic Port Fairy Heritage-Listed Hideaway
description:
Venture to the end of the famed Great Ocean Road to meet with the sleepy beachside town of Port Fairy, where a serene stay at The Oak & Anchor Hotel beckons. This tranquil, heritage-listed property has played a part in the town’s history since the mid-1800s, and its location at the end of this iconic coastal stretch makes it all the more tempting to leave the city behind.

The colourful and vibrant history of the town will not be lost on you. There are up to 50 buildings classified by the National Trust for you to seek out, rich maritime history on the Shipwreck and Maritime Heritage Walk and, in the winter months, southern right whales for you to spot off the coast. While days away perusing endless antique stores, quirky boutiques and an array of exceptional dining options, before retreating to the contemporary elegance of the hotel's six suites, each boasting an open-plan style bathroom, elegant furnishings and high-end fittings throughout.
offer_address: 9 Bank Street, Port Fairy, Victoria 3284, Australia
